title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Restructured billing documentation for Git LFS, GitHub Actions, GitHub Advanced Security, GitHub Codespaces, GitHub Models, and GitHub Packages to follow a consistent format.
Added detailed explanations of usage measurement, free quotas, overage handling, and payment processes for each product.
Created new reference files: `actions-minute-multipliers.md` and `models-multipliers-and-costs.md` for pricing details.
Clarified cost calculation examples and included token-based billing for GitHub Models.
Added redirects and fixed missing links across documentation files.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Restructured billing documentation for Git LFS, GitHub Actions, GitHub Advanced Security, GitHub Codespaces, GitHub Models, and GitHub Packages to follow a consistent format.
- Added detailed explanations of usage measurement, free quotas, overage handling, and payment processes for each product.
- Created new reference files: `actions-minute-multipliers.md` and `models-multipliers-and-costs.md` for pricing details.
- Clarified cost calculation examples and included token-based billing for GitHub Models.
- Added redirects and fixed missing links across documentation files.

### Title
Restructure and enhance billing documentation for GitHub products
